extendedInfo.description: One of the best Horoscopes Apps!Horoscope features:â â â  DREAMBOOK (NEW)  â â â - Daily Horoscopes for all zodiac signs- Daily Love Horoscope (Singles)- Daily Love Horoscope (Couples)- Daily Career Horoscopes- Weekly Horoscopes (Flirt, Romantic, Business, Travel)- Monthly Horoscopes (Romantic, Career, Fitness)- Yearly Horoscopes- Profile & Characteristics (Full Horoscopes)- Chinese Full Horoscope- Chinese Daily Horoscope- Love Matcher- Friendship Matcher Horoscopes for Aquarius, Pisces, Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn.Chinese horoscopes for Rat, Ox, Tiger, Rabbit, Dragon, Snake, Horse, Sheep, Monkey, Rooster, Dog, Boar.A horoscope is what astrological predictions are based on, as every horoscope is different and is a representation of the personality and destiny of the individual. Astrological analysis of a person begins with the preparation of a horoscope which requires exact date, time and place of birth of that person concerned. Since the creation of the zodiac the accurate judgment of a horoscope is the most important job and is the main objective of the astrology.Horoscopes represent the picture of the planets during the birth of any person. Read your love, personal and professional horoscopes via our free daily, weekly and monthly horoscopes.

reviews.title: very nice
reviews.comment: one of the best apps Ive used so far very accurate and easy to use!
reviews.author: Danielle Bryant

reviews.title: Accurate
reviews.comment: It is a very powerful tool especially with the dream book!! It is very accurate just as my traditional tribe dream foretold. I love it and will recommend it any of my friends & Coworkers!!
reviews.author: Ibrahim Kamara

reviews.title: Not bad.
reviews.comment: I like the option of daily, weekly, monthly ect. The Chinese horoscope is a nice feature too. For these alone I give 4 stars. The dream book/ meanings could be more user friendly. The search option in the dream book is pointless since it doesnt work...ever. otherwise a good app that runs wells. No bugs or problems.
reviews.author: Maui Sky

reviews.title: A Must Have! AMAZING!!
reviews.comment: I have downloaded many horoscope apps, This one is amazing! Chinese, Daily scope,dream, compatibility, ALL combined.. Love the weekly, monthly, year options! Seems to be very accurate in predictions! Definitely in my top 5 of Apps.
reviews.author: April Wright

reviews.title: Great app. Very knowledgeable
reviews.comment: Love the horoscopes. Accurate and very knowledgeable. However there are a few pop up ads every know and then.
reviews.author: Anastaisa Simpson

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: Worth your storage. Though dream book feels like something missin.. try having phrases as well not only words. All in all, most complete and good astro app ive installed and tried. Im keepin this on my mobile. =) If also u can try having \'Share\' option would be great addition.
reviews.author: jc celerio

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Its nice to just get some insights to the day or week. Pretty good forecast on this app. Good job.
reviews.author: Frank Chin

reviews.title: Excellent site!
reviews.comment: I find that the accuracy, is pretty right on.At least, as far as horoscopes can predict. The soul emergence horoscope, can bring more insight.This would make your site suberb!!
reviews.author: Julia Rogers

reviews.title: Excellent app....
reviews.comment: Great app. It has everything. Just what I\'ve been looking for. Thank you.
reviews.author: Anthony Wilson

reviews.title: Not working ...
reviews.comment: It was one of d best app. Bt all of a sudden it has stopped working...whole screen is turning black...plz resolve d issue.i lv dis app.
reviews.author: pushpanjali dubey

reviews.title: Thumbs Up
reviews.comment: The One I Was Looking For... Great App
reviews.author: Shahrin Shah

reviews.title: Wonderful app
reviews.comment: I actully feel like they know me. Thank you, very insitful
reviews.author: Malinda Kropsch

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I often use these horoscopes just to see if anything it says is closely related to how my day went. Well let me say this is the most accurate horoscope I have ever witnessed. It\'s so close to the truth that it is somewhat unnerving.  You will have to try it for yourself to fully understand what I am saying.
reviews.author: Teleasa McGlother

reviews.title: This is the best horoscope app I have got.  AND FOR FREE!
reviews.comment: Its got more than you need to know.
reviews.author: Madi Dana

reviews.title: Very good for 2013
reviews.comment: Maybe it\'s the forecast for 2013; the  chinese zodiac and just the daily stuff. It gets me through the day...
reviews.author: Hector Griffin

reviews.title: Nice app.
reviews.comment: Like this app very much.so fun and some things are really true. 4 stars because there is still the horoscope from last week!! :)
reviews.author: Emel Caka

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I luv this app
reviews.author: janel Carson

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Horoscopes have always been right on point with me, and this app is just another example.
reviews.author: Katie Leeanne

reviews.title: Gud/bad
reviews.comment: Itz gud app bt betr if it runz wtout onlne(i rly hate app wch run oli in onlne) plzzz fix it.
reviews.author: Ashom Angnao

reviews.title: Atul
reviews.comment: Nice application with detailed explanation in small memory space.                       *--*ATUL
